full_description:
Xiaomi Mijia MJGTJ01LF Handheld Garment Steamer

The Xiaomi Mijia MJGTJ01LF Handheld clothing Steamer is a multipurpose marvel that will streamline your clothing care routine with unprecedented efficiency and ease. This MJGTJ01LF revolutionary steamer combines the features of a hanging steamer and a steam iron into a single small and flexible item, saving you significant space and removing the need for several appliances. Powered by a powerful 1200W Steam Plus intelligent steam heating technology, this steamer provides supercharged steaming performance, instantly removing wrinkles from your clothing without the need of water, ensuring they remain dry and ready to wear. The detachable huge water tank, intelligently positioned at the back of the device, not only offers adequate capacity for extended steaming periods, but also contributes to perfect handed balance for pleasant and controlled operation. The MJGTJ01LF steamer is designed for garment safety, featuring a 130℃ aluminum cast panel that provides fast shape without damaging delicate textiles. The MJGTJ01LF  steamer's ergonomic 5° tilt body, which fits pleasantly in the hand, and desktop vertical form make it convenient to travel and use in any situation. The MJGTJ01LF  steamer's 30-second heating duration provides speedy results, allowing you to handle wrinkles effectively. Furthermore, the MJGTJ01LF steamer's high-temperature sterilizing and mite removal capabilities have an astonishing 99.9% efficacy, assuring your garments are not only wrinkle-free but also free from harmful bacteria and allergens. With a rated voltage of 220V, a frequency of 50Hz, and a power rating of 1200W, the Xiaomi Mijia Handheld clothing Steamer provides constant and dependable performance, making it the ideal partner for your clothing care requirements. The Xiaomi Mijia MJGTJ01LF Handheld Garment Steamer eliminates wrinkles and provides uncomplicated garment care.

full_description:
Panasonic NI-M250T Steam Iron

The Panasonic NI-M250T Steam Iron is a strong and versatile device that makes ironing a breeze. With a maximum power of 1550W and a Power Shot function that produces a blast of 75g of steam, this iron easily handles even the hardest creases. Its vertical shot feature enables for easy wrinkle removal from hanging items, adding versatility to your ironing regimen. With a constant steam rate of 0 to 15g/min and an Anti-Calc System, this iron provides smooth and efficient ironing while eliminating calcium accumulation for easy maintenance and long-lasting performance. The innovative titanium-coated soleplate ensures robust and smooth ironing, smoothly sliding across materials for consistently high-quality results. The Panasonic NI-M250T Steam Iron, equipped with a 360° swivel cord for greater movement, provides convenience and efficiency for all your ironing needs.

Powerful Steam Removes Stubborn Wrinkles

Creases can be efficiently smoothed out by spraying up to 15 g/min of steam. Furthermore, pressing the button of NI-M250T activates the Power Shot function, which generates a forceful blast of steam that penetrates deep into the garment and is useful for eradicating stubborn creases.

Tough & Smooth Ironing

Advanced Titanium Coated Soleplate glides effortlessly and withstands prolonged use. The smoothness of Panasonic NI-M250T movement has enhanced by 20%, and anti-scratch performance has improved by four stages (from 2H to 6H).

full_description:
Panasonic NI-E410T Steam Iron

The Panasonic NI-E410T Steam Iron is a flexible and powerful device that will improve your ironing experience. With a powerful 2,150W motor working at 220-240V, this steam iron provides remarkable performance, sliding over wrinkles and creases with accuracy and ease. Its titanium-coated soleplate features a unique U-Shape design that promotes excellent steam circulation and heat dispersion on all materials. The round ride soleplate improves mobility by providing smooth glide across clothing for easy ironing. This NI-E410T iron has a variety of innovative capabilities, including steam, spray, and jet-of-steam functions, and gives a programmable steam output of up to 89g/min, enabling you to adjust the steam level to suit different materials and ironing needs. The self-cleaning technology simplifies maintenance by automatically eliminating calcium deposits and other impurities, extending the iron's life and maintaining its performance. The auto anti-calc system eliminates mineral formation, resulting in constant steam supply and improved ironing performance over time. Furthermore, the NI-E410T iron has a big 200ml water tank, which reduces the need for frequent refills and allows for longer ironing sessions without interruption. Whether you're pressing delicate clothing, removing persistent creases, or rejuvenating upholstery and drapes, the Panasonic NI-E410T Steam Iron provides professional-quality results with convenience and efficiency. With its strength, adaptability, and sophisticated capabilities, this steam iron is an essential tool for consistently producing beautiful, wrinkle-free clothing and linens.
